imdb.plot outline: A remote area in suburban Phoenix is being terrorized by zombie attacks and it's up to local zombie hunter Jake Townsley to stop them. Paired with Tully, his dim-witted intern, he comes across an evil plot to take over the world by none other than the displaced god of the dead himself, Baron Samedi. But that's only the tip of the iceberg when the zombie god finds Jake's weakness lurks in the recesses of his own mind, and that the final key to taking over the world may rest there too.
imdb.title: Zombie Hunter M.D
plot: A zombie hunter is in for the fight of his life when a god of ancient power attempts to turn the world into an all you can eat buffet.::Michael Flanders

A remote area in suburban Phoenix is being terrorized by zombie attacks and it's up to local zombie hunter Jake Townsley to stop them. Paired with Tully, his dim-witted intern, he comes across an evil plot to take over the world by none other than the displaced god of the dead himself, Baron Samedi. But that's only the tip of the iceberg when the zombie god finds Jake's weakness lurks in the recesses of his own mind, and that the final key to taking over the world may rest there too.::Michael Flanders
